name: Space Junker (DillCurr)
description:
Disclaimer: Space Junker was made as a student project and is a prototype build in its current state and as such most assets are placeholders but are still credited, high scores aren't working and corpses have permanence. I will be coming back as time permits to fix issues and add content. :)

You've been lured into an ambush by a group of space bandits, too bad for them that you have the best gear in the galaxy. Fend them off as long as you can before you become junk yourself!

Controls:

W A S D will move your ship around.
The ship aims towards the mouse.
Left click to fire a standard shot.
Right click to fire a homing shot.
Middle mouse button to fire a Bomb, you get another one every 1000 score!

Pick-ups:

The green cross icon restores 50 health.
The red speedometer icon doubles your attack speed by 2 each time, but only for 5 seconds!

Let me know how you go and enjoy!
